Literature.Title: Discovery and Characterization of Marinsedin, a New Class II Lanthipeptide Derived from Marine Bacterium Marinicella sediminis F2T
Literature.Author: Han Y, Wang X, Zhang Y, Huo L

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis 168(MIC=>200µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>200µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=>200µM),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=>200µM),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(IC50=44.31±15.45µM),Human colon adenocarcinoma HCT 116(IC50=177.87±18.76µM),Human lung carcinoma A549(IC50=>200µM)
